text: This is a list of the Roman emperors: Many of them were murdered by relatives, enemies, friends, and soldiers. *Julioâ€“Claudian dynasty *Year of the Four Emperors *Flavian dynasty *Nerva-Antonine dynasty *Year of the Five Emperors and Severan dynasty *Crisis of the Third Century *The Dominate: Tetrarchy and Constantinian dynasty *Valentinianic dynasty *Theodosian dynasty *Western Roman Empire *Eastern Roman Empire or Byzantium Note there were also numerous usurpers ("fake" emperors) including: # Domitianus II (usurper) ==References== Category:Lists of monarchs *
title: List of Roman emperors
